improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero.  The variable x is decremented to 0 in the for loop, leading to a division by zero error on line 8. Add check to ensure x !=0 before division operation or handle the exception appropriately.
Unreachable code. The loop always executes 10 times. There is no conditional statement to break or skip the loop. The current code will always result in x = 0.
Potential performance improvement. The loop could be replaced by a single assignment operation, reducing the number of iterations.  x = (10 - 10) = 0; y = (1/x); which is still a division by zero.
